# Scripts

Bundled resources for soc2-audit-helper skill

- [x] generate_soc2_report.py: Automates the generation of SOC2 compliance reports based on collected data.
- [x] identify_compliance_gaps.py: Analyzes collected data to identify potential compliance gaps and vulnerabilities.
- [x] suggest_remediation_steps.py: Provides suggestions for remediation steps to address identified compliance gaps.
- [x] evidence_gathering_automation.py: Automates the process of gathering evidence for SOC2 audits.
